document.full_text: embattled yemeni president ali abdullah saleh told a huge rally of supporters on friday that he would sacrifice everything for his country, suggesting he has no plans to step down yet.
document.title: yemen's saleh signals defiance at loyalist rally
lines_and_colors: embattled yemeni president ali abdullah saleh told a huge rally of supporters on friday that he would sacrifice everything for his country, suggesting he has no plans to step down yet.
